agents.network_manager.NetworkManagerFlightPlanProcessing¶

class agents.network_manager.NetworkManagerFlightPlanProcessing(agent)¶

Bases: Role

NMFPP

Description: Process a flight plan submition by the NM. It checks if ATFM delay is needed and if it is the case returns the ATFM delay.

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

compute_atfm_delay(fp)

This computes the ATFM delay using an FPFS algorithm.
